content.title: Digital Signage Native
content.content: WIP: Digital Signage for Android and IOS using React Native.

content.title: Digital Signage
content.content:
The biggest project I ever had. Fully refactored in vanilla JS.

Designed and structured a personalised framework to match all the needs of the systems and api's that connect to the digital design system and allow digital signage to work on any platform fluidly. These include: MacOS, Linux, RPI(ARM), Windows, LG WebOS.

content.title: Way2Queue
content.content:
A queuing system for major banks, which has an hierarchical statistic system and control.

The idea is to maintain each branch independant but sync with the main system.

content.title: CIM
content.content:
NOTE: Due to DNA I cannot show this product.

The idea is meant to have an easy and accesible way to make a doctors appointment based on your location using google maps api.

content.title: BIO-CIRCLE - E-commerce
content.content: Developed UX experienced based on the design team, such as dynamic tables carousels and many other aspects of UX were implemented.

content.title: Sawade
content.content: One of the most delicious and artistic sweets out there. Developed UX based on the design team, in a very pixel perfect fashion.

content.title: Wordpress Votum.de
content.content:
Maintained and introduced new features to the main companies website.
Developed widgets; refactored; a LOT of LESS
